title: Bug 18915[Preferences] switching between erroneous preferences pages should generate error, not warning.
OB: When entering invalid data on any preference page, the UI red flags the error. If I try to select another page without fixing the problem, a warning dialog appears with the message: 'Warning: The currently displayed page contains invalid values'.
EB: The warning dialog should be changed to an error dialog to indicate that the user is not allowed to leave the page without fixing the mistake.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Enter invalid data on any preference page. 2. Try to select another page without fixing the problem. 3. Observe the warning dialog displaying the message described above.
